ygData.subject: RE: SoW vs. Accelerando conflict
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Aye and if they do that, I can guarantee it ll be the last time I SOW anyone outside of my party with my druid char.. the mana isn t a big deal, but having
ygData.messageBody:
> that's fine so long as they add SoW to the party only buff list like the
> invis spells, if druid's start SoW'ing me when I'm on a long trip I'm gonna
> be real irritated, real irritated.

Aye and if they do that, I can guarantee it'll be the last time I SOW
anyone outside of my party with my druid char.. the mana isn't a big deal,
but having to disband, wait for the guy to group, regroup with my group is
a big deal. Right now I give out SOW freely whenever playing my druid.
